anya-e0907n0:3_0: Sadevakopi ce loko, āgantvā tāsayeyya maṃ;
anya-e0907n0:4_0: Na me paṭibalo assa, janetuṃ bhayabheravaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:5_0: Sacepi tvaṃ mahiṃ sabbaṃ, sasamuddaṃ sapabbataṃ;
anya-e0907n0:9_0: Mā dāni kodhaṃ janayittha, ito uddhaṃ yathā pure;
anya-e0907n0:11_0: Karotha mettaṃ sattesu, vasantu manujā sukhaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:12_0: Cattāro āsīvisā uggatejā ghoravisāti kho bhikkhave catunnetaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:13_0: Pañca vadhakā paccatthikāti kho bhikkhave pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:14_0: Chaṭṭho antaracaro vadhako ukkhittāsikoti kho bhikkhave nandīrāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:15_0: Suñño gāmoti kho bhikkhave channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:16_0: Corā gāmaghātakāti kho bhikkhave channetaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:17_0: Mahāudakaṇṇavo kho bhikkhave catunnetaṃ oghānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:18_0: Orimaṃ tīraṃ sāsaṅkaṃ sappaṭibhayanti kho bhikkhave sakkāyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:19_0: Pārimaṃ tīraṃ khemaṃ appaṭibhayanti kho bhikkhave nibbānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:22_0: Duṭṭhaṃ nāgaṃ pasādetvā, mocesi bandhanā bahū.
anya-e0907n0:23_0: Punapi bhante dakkhemu saṅgati ce bhavissati.
anya-e0907n0:25_0: Devaputto javo nāma, yo me mālaṃ paṭicchati.
anya-e0907n0:26_0: Muhuttoviya so dibbo, idha vassāni soḷasa;
anya-e0907n0:27_0: Rattindivo ca so dibbo, mānusiṃ sarado sataṃ.
anya-e0907n0:29_0: Kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
anya-e0907n0:30_0: Yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jāti jāti punappunaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:32_0: Yā icche puriso hotuṃ, jāti jāti punappunaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:34_0: Yo icche dibbabhogañca, dibbamāyuṃ yasaṃ sukhaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:36_0: Yaṃ bhikkhave sadevakassa lokassa samārakassa sabrahmakassa sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
anya-e0907n0:36_1: diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anuvicaritaṃ manasā,
anya-e0907n0:37_0: Iti kho bhikkhave tathāgato diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu tādīyeva tādī,
anya-e0907n0:37_1: tumhā ca pana tādimhā añño tādī uttaritaro vā paṇītataro vā natthīti vadāmi.
anya-e0907n0:42_0: Ahaṃ buddhañca dhammañca, saṅghañca saraṇaṃ gato,
anya-e0907n0:44_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupuci mandamūle.
anya-e0907n0:46_0: Dvāraṃ vā pana nibbāna, nagarassa pavesane.
anya-e0907n0:47_0: Alameva kātuṃ kalyāṇaṃ, dānaṃ dātuṃ yathārahaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:48_0: Pāṇiṃ kāmadadaṃ disvā, ko puññaṃ nakarissati.
anya-e0907n0:63_0: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, kāle vassaṃ ciraṃ pajaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:64_0: Tappetu devo dhammena, rājā rakkhatu mediniṃ.
anya-e0907n0:72_0: Yaṃ upagato gatamalaṃ, vande tamanuttaraṃ dhammaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:77_0: Sammāsambuddheneva hi tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ atthavaṇṇanākkamo bhāsito,
anya-e0907n0:82_0: Icceva kato tasmā, tampi gahetvāna saddhimetāya;
anya-e0907n0:87_0: Cittaṃ rakkhetha medhāvī, cittaṃ guttaṃ sukhāvahaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:88_0: So evaṃ samāhite citte parisuddhe pariyodāte anaṅgaṇe vigatūpakkilese mudubhūte kammaniye ṭhite ānañjappatte
anya-e0907n0:89_0: Yaṃhitaṃ bhikkhave sammāvadamāne vadeyya samantapāso mārassāti,
anya-e0907n0:89_1: mātugāmaṃyeva sammā vadamāno vadeyya samantapāso mārassāti.
anya-e0907n0:90_0: Yo bhikkhu divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāya ca āvaraṇīyehi dhammehi cittaṃ parisodhetvā.
anya-e0907n0:91_0: Iti cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasena ayaṃ kāyasammato aṭṭhisaṅghāto abhikkamati.
anya-e0907n0:92_0: Karuṇā viya sattesu, paññā yassa mahesino;
anya-e0907n0:100_0: Mātaraṃ pamukhaṃ katvā, tassā paññāya tejasā;
anya-e0907n0:104_0: Yaṃ devadevo devānaṃ, desetvā nayato puna;
anya-e0907n0:107_0: Yañca sutvāna so thero, āharitvā mahītalaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:110_0: Yaṃ karomasi brahmuno, samaṃ devehi mārisa;
anya-e0907n0:111_0: Tadajja tuyhaṃ kassāma, handa sāmaṃ karoma te.
anya-e0907n0:116_0: Etthete pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhanti.
anya-e0907n0:117_0: Cakkhuṃ cāvuso paṭicca rūpeca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:117_10: tato nidānaṃ purisaṃ papañcasaññāsaṅkhā samudācaranti atītānāgatapaccuppannesu cakkhuviññeyyasu rūpesu –
anya-e0907n0:118_0: Purimā bhikkhave koṭi na paññāyati avijjāya.
anya-e0907n0:123_0: Abhikkamissāmi paṭikkamissāmīti hi cittaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
anya-e0907n0:128_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ kusalaṃ tassa, ānubhāvena pāṇino;
anya-e0907n0:132_0: Ciraṃ tiṭṭhatu saddhammo, dhamme hontu sagāravā;
anya-e0907n0:133_0: Sabbepi sattā kālena, sammā devo pavassatu;
anya-e0907n0:142_1: aṭṭhakathā saṃgītiyā āvuso paṭhame sannipāte sakalā ca vinayasaṃvaṇṇanā dīghanikāye ca sīlakkhandhavaggavaṇṇanā
anya-e0907n0:142_2: abhidhamme ca dhammasaṅgahasaṃvaṇṇanā saṃgītā therehi chaṭṭhasaṃgītikārehi.
anya-e0907n0:142_3: Idāni pana dutiye sannipāte dīghanikāye mahāvaggavaṇṇanāto paṭṭhāya tadavasesānaṃ yathāvavatthitasaṃvaṇṇanānaṃ saṃgāyanokāso anuppatto.
anya-e0907n0:142_4: Tasmā imissā dutiyasannipātasaṃgītiyā pubbakiccavasena yathānuppattāya mahāvagge mahāpadānasuttasaṃvaṇṇanāya pucchāvissajjanaṃ kātuṃ samārabhāma.
anya-e0907n0:142_5: Mahāpadānasuttassa āvuso nidāne pariyāpannassa “karerikuṭikāya”ntipadassa attho kathaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:143_1: mahāpadānasuttassa bhante nidāne pariyāpannassa karerikuṭikāyantipadassa attho “karerikuṭikāya”nti karerīti varuṇarukkhassa nāmaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:143_4: Yathā kosambarukkhassa dvāreṭhitattā kosambakuṭikāti evamādinā bhante aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:146_0: Antojetavane kira karerikuṭi kosambakuṭi gandhakuṭi salaḷāgāranti cattāri mahāgehāni –
anya-e0907n0:150_1: tattheva āvuso nidāne pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā dhammīkathā udapādītivacanassa attho kathaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:151_1: tattheva bhante nidāne pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttā dhammīkathā udapādīti vacanassa attho pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttāti
anya-e0907n0:151_2: ekampijātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti evaṃ nibaddhena pubbenivuṭṭhakhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsena saddhiṃ
anya-e0907n0:151_6: Pubbenivāsaṃ nāma ke anussaranti ke nānussarantīti diṭṭhiyā anussaranti,
anya-e0907n0:151_7: sāvakā sa paccekabuddhā ca buddhā ca anussaranti.
anya-e0907n0:151_9: Ye aggapattā kammavādino tepi cattālīsaṃyeva kappe anussaranti,
anya-e0907n0:151_10: na tato paranti evamādinā bhante aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:152_0: Pubbenivāsapaṭisaṃyuttāti ekampi jātiṃ dvepi jātiyoti evaṃ nibaddhena pubbenivuṭṭhakhandhasantānasaṅkhātena pubbenivāsena saddhiṃ yojetvā pavattitā.
anya-e0907n0:154_1: tasmiṃ āvuso mahāpadānasutte uddesavāre navasu paricchedavāresu paṭhame kappaparicchedavāre bhaddakappeti
anya-e0907n0:155_1: tasmiṃ bhante mahāpadānasutte uddesavāre navasu paricchedavāresu paṭhame kappaparicchedavāre bhaddakappeti
anya-e0907n0:155_2: padassa attho bhaddakappeti pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe sārakappeti bhagavā imaṃ kappaṃ
anya-e0907n0:155_4: Yato paṭṭhāya kira amhākaṃ bhagavā abhinīhāro kato,
anya-e0907n0:155_5: ekasmiṃ antare ekasmimpi kappe pañcabuddhā nibbattā nāma natthīti evamādinā bhante aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:156_0: Vipassissa bhikkhave bhagavato ito so bhikkhave chanavutikappe yaṃ vipassī bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho loke udapādi –
anya-e0907n0:157_0: Saddakappeti pañcabuddhuppādapaṭimaṇḍitattā sundarakappe sārakappeti bhagavā imaṃ kappaṃ thomento evamāha –
anya-e0907n0:158_1: etasmiṃ antare ekasmimpi kappe pañcabuddhā nibbattā nāma natthi” –
anya-e0907n0:160_1: catutthe panāvuso āyuparicchedavāre appaṃ vā bhiyyoti etesaṃ padānaṃ attho kathaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:161_1: catutthe pana bhante āyuparicchedavāre appaṃ vā bhiyyoti etesaṃ padānaṃ attho “appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato vā upari appaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:161_2: aññaṃ vassasataṃ apatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃ vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati.
anya-e0907n0:161_4: asuko kira evaṃ ciraṃ jīvatīti tattha tattha gantvā daṭṭhabbo hotī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha aṭṭhakathācariyena kathito.
anya-e0907n0:162_0: Mayhaṃ bhikkhave etarahi appakaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ parittaṃ lahukaṃ yo ciraṃ jīvati so vassasataṃ appaṃ vā bhiyyo.
anya-e0907n0:163_0: Appaṃ vā bhiyyoti vassasatato vā upari appaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:163_1: ayyaṃ vassasataṃ apatvā vīsaṃ vā tiṃsaṃ vā cattālīsaṃvā vā paṇṇāsaṃ vā saṭṭhi vā vassāni jīvati–
anya-e0907n0:165_0: Pucchā – aṭṭhame panāvuso upaṭṭhākaparicchedavāre ānandotipade kathaṃ aṭṭhakathācariyena vaṇṇito.
anya-e0907n0:166_1: aṭṭhame pana bhante upaṭṭhākaparicchede pana ānandoti nibaddhupaṭṭhākabhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttanti evamādinā bhante aṭṭhakathācariyena vaṇṇito.
anya-e0907n0:167_0: Mayhaṃ bhikkhave etarahi ānando nāma bhikkhu upaṭṭhāko ahosi aggupaṭṭhāko–
anya-e0907n0:171_0: Ekacce bhikkhū iminā maggena gacchāmāti vutte aññena gacchanti.
anya-e0907n0:172_0: Uṭṭhehi āvuso ānanda, uṭṭhehi āvuso ānanda.
anya-e0907n0:181_0: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi, puna gehaṃ na kāhasi.
anya-e0907n0:182_0: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā, gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhataṃ;
anya-e0907n0:187_0: Paññāpetuṃ gati natthi, pattānaṃ acalaṃ sukhaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:188_0: Na pana bhagavā milakkhusadiso hoti nāpi āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalo.
anya-e0907n0:190_0: Na kho ānanda ettāvatā tathāgato sakkato vā hoti garukato vā mānito vā pūjito vā apacito vā.
anya-e0907n0:191_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā aññattha ekaṃ umāpupphamattampi gahetvā buddha guṇe āvajjetvā katāya pūjāya buddhañāṇenāpi aparicchinnaṃ vipākaṃ vaṇṇetvā–
anya-e0907n0:192_0: Yo kho ānanda bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā upāsako vā upāsikā vā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno viharati sāmīcippaṭipanno
anya-e0907n0:192_1: anudhammacārī so tathā gataṃ sakkaroti garukaroti māneti pūjeti apaciyati paramāya –
anya-e0907n0:193_0: Siyā kho panānanda tumhākaṃ evamassa ‘atītasatthukaṃ pāvacanaṃ, natthi no satthā’ti.
anya-e0907n0:194_0: Na kho panetaṃ ānanda evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:195_0: Dhammopi desito ceva paññattoca, vinayopi desito ceva paññatto ca–
anya-e0907n0:196_0: Assosi kho rājā māgadho ajātasattu vedehiputto bhagavā kira kusinārāyaṃ parinibbutoti.
anya-e0907n0:197_2: pothujjanikasaddhāya pana amhākaṃ raññā sadiso natthi,
anya-e0907n0:198_1: tassa paṭighātatthaṃ tumhehi dukūladupaṭṭaṃ nivāsetvā yathā nāsāpuṭamattaṃ paññāyati,
anya-e0907n0:199_1: amhākaṃ āyuvaḍḍhano cetiyaṭṭhānaṃ puññakkhettaṃ abhisekasiñcako so bhagavā satthā kusinārāya parinibbutoti.
anya-e0907n0:200_0: Bhagavā sabbaññu nanu imasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā dhammaṃ desayittha,
anya-e0907n0:200_4: idāni pana me paṭivacanampi na detha bhagavāti.
anya-e0907n0:201_0: Nanu bhagavā ahaṃ aññadā evarūpe kāle tumhe mahābhikkhu saṅghaparivārā jambudīpatale cārikaṃ carathāti suṇomi.
anya-e0907n0:202_0: Mama parideviteneva na sijjhati, dasabalassa dhātuyo āharāpessāmīti evaṃ assosi.
anya-e0907n0:203_2: āharaṇupāyena āharissāmīti caturaṅginiṃ senaṃ sannayhitvā sayampi nikkhantoyeva.
anya-e0907n0:204_0: Yathā ca ajātasattu, evaṃ licchavī ādayopi.
anya-e0907n0:205_1: yuddhaṃ vāti kusinārānagaraṃ parivāretvā ṭhite etaṃ bhagavā amhākaṃ gāmakkhettehi paṭivacanaṃ avocuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:206_2: Satthā pana sayameva āgantvā sāsanaṃ pesetvā amhe pakkosāpesi.
anya-e0907n0:206_3: Tumhepi kho pana yaṃ tumhākaṃ gāmakkhette ratanaṃ uppajjati.
anya-e0907n0:206_5: Sadevake ca loke buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthi,
anya-e0907n0:206_7: na kho pana tumhehiyeva mātuthanato khīraṃ pītaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:206_11: Hotūti aññamaññaṃ ahaṃkāraṃ katvā sāsanapaṭisāsanaṃ pesenti.
anya-e0907n0:207_0: Ete rājāno bhagavato parinibbutaṭṭhāne vivādaṃ karonti,
anya-e0907n0:208_0: Ācariyassa viya bho saddo, ācariyassa viya bho saddoti sabbe niravā ahesuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:219_0: Na hi sādhukaṃ uttamapuggalassa, sarīrabhāge siyā sampahāroti na hi sādhuyanti na hi sādhu ayaṃ –
anya-e0907n0:220_0: Bhagavā sabbasu pubbe mayaṃ tumhākaṃ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇapaṭimaṇḍitaṃ chabbaṇṇabuddharasmikhacitaṃ
anya-e0907n0:220_2: idāni pana suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva dhātuyo avasiṭṭhā jātā,
anya-e0907n0:221_0: Kena nu kho sadevakassa lokassa kaṅkhacchedanatthāya catusaccakathāya paccayabhūtā bhagavato dakkhiṇadāṭhā
anya-e0907n0:221_1: gahitāti olokento brāhmaṇena gahitāti disvā brāhmaṇopi daṭhāya anucchavikaṃ sakkāraṃ nasakkhissati gaṇhāmi
anya-e0907n0:221_2: natthi veṭṭhantarato gahetvā suvaṇṇacaṅkoṭake ṭhapetvā devalokaṃ netvā cūḷāmaṇicetiye patiṭṭhapesi –
anya-e0907n0:222_0: Rājagahe bhagavato sarīrānaṃ thūpañca mahañca akāsi.
anya-e0907n0:223_0: Samaṇassa gotamassa parinibbutakālato paṭṭhāya balakkārena sādhukīḷitāya upaddutumha,
anya-e0907n0:224_0: Mahājano manaṃ padosetvā apāye nibbattīti disvā sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ dhātuāharaṇūpāyaṃ kāressāmāti tassa
anya-e0907n0:224_1: santikaṃ gantvā tamatthaṃ ārocetvā dhātuāharaṇūpāyaṃ karomi mahārājāti āhaṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:225_0: Bhante puthujjano nāma ajātasattunā samo saddho nāma natthi,
anya-e0907n0:225_2: apica kho māravibhiṃ sakasadisaṃ vibhiṃsakaṃ dassessāmi mahāsaddaṃ sāvessāmi yakkhagāhakakhipitakaarocake karissāmi,
anya-e0907n0:225_3: tumhe amanussā mahārāja kupitā dhātuyo āharāpethāti vadeyyātha,
anya-e0907n0:226_0: Mahārāja amanussā kupitā, dhātuyo āharāpehīti bhaṇiṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:227_0: Na tāva bhante mayhaṃ cittaṃ tussati, evaṃ santepi āharantūti āha.
anya-e0907n0:228_0: Mahārāja ekaṃ dhātunidhānaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti āha.
anya-e0907n0:232_0: Idha rājā kiṃ kāretīti pucchantānampi mahāsāvakānaṃ cetiyānīti vadanti.
anya-e0907n0:233_2: dīpā mā vijjhāyantūti adhiṭṭhahitvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni chindāpesi –
anya-e0907n0:234_0: Anāgate piyadoso nāma kumāro chattaṃ ussāpetvā asoko dhammarājā bhavissati,
anya-e0907n0:235_0: Anāgate daliddarājā imaṃ maṇiṃ gahetvā dhātūnaṃ sakkāraṃ karotūti akkharaṃ chindāpesi.
anya-e0907n0:236_0: Tāta ajātasattunā dhātunidhānaṃ kataṃ, ettha ārakkhaṃ paṭṭhapehīti pahiṇi.
anya-e0907n0:239_0: Nassati vata bho me ayaṃ sampattīti bhayābhibhūto ahosi.
anya-e0907n0:240_0: Atthi nu kho koci samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā lokapitā maho mahābrahmāvā,
anya-e0907n0:240_1: yo me hadayanissitaṃ sokasallaṃ samuddharitvā imaṃ sampattiṃ thāvaraṃ kareyyāti olokento kañci adisvā
anya-e0907n0:240_2: puna addasa mādisānaṃ satasahassānampi uppannaṃ sokasallaṃ sammāsambuddho uddharituṃ paṭibaloti.
anya-e0907n0:241_1: katipāhaṃ pana atikkamitvā mayi indasālaguhāyaṃ viharante pañca pubbanimittāni disvā maraṇabhayabhīto
anya-e0907n0:241_2: dvīsu devalokesu devatāhi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā cuddasa pañhe pucchitvā upekkhāpañhavissajjanāvasāne
anya-e0907n0:241_3: asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissatīti cintetvā okāsaṃ nākāsi.
anya-e0907n0:242_0: Mama pubbepi ekakassa gatattā satthārā okāso nakato,
anya-e0907n0:242_2: ekassa pana upanissaye sati cakkavāḷapariyantāyapi parisāya bhagavā dhammaṃ desetiyeva.
anya-e0907n0:242_3: Avassaṃ kho pana dvīsu devalokesu kassaci devassa upanissayo bhavissati,
anya-e0907n0:242_5: Taṃ sutvā ahampi attano domanassaṃ vūpasamessāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:243_0: Dvīsu devalokesu devatā gahetvā dhurena paharantassa viya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamituṃ nayuttaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:243_1: ayaṃpana pañcasikho dasabalassa upaṭṭhāko vallabho icchiticchitakkhaṇe gantvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā dhammaṃ suṇāti,
anya-e0907n0:243_2: imaṃ purato pesetvā okāsaṃ kāretvā iminā katokāse upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchissāmīti okāsakaraṇatthaṃ āmantesi.
anya-e0907n0:244_1: bhaddaṃ tava yo tvaṃ maṃ ehi mārisa uyyāna kīḷādīni vā naṭasamajjādīni vā dassanāya gacchāmāti avatvā
anya-e0907n0:244_2: buddhaṃ passissāma dhammaṃ sossāmāti vadasīti daḷhataraṃ upatthambhento devānamindassa vacanaṃ paṭissutvā
anya-e0907n0:245_0: Vande te pitaraṃ bhadde, timbaruṃ sūriyavacchase;
anya-e0907n0:247_0: Evaṃ vutte bhagavā pañcasikhaṃ gandhabbadevaputtaṃ etadavoca.
anya-e0907n0:247_1: Saṃsandati kho te pañcasikha tantissaro gītassarena gītassaro ca tantissarena,
anya-e0907n0:247_2: naca pana te pañcasikha tantissaro gītassaraṃ ativattati gītassaro ca tantissaraṃ.
anya-e0907n0:247_3: Kadā saṃyūḷhā pana te pañcasikha vmi gāthā buddhūpasañhitā dhammūpasañhitā saṃyūpasañhitā arahantūpasañhitā kāmūpasañhitāti –
anya-e0907n0:248_0: Bhagavatā pañcasikhassa okāso nakatoti devatā gahetvā tatova paṭinivatteyya.
anya-e0907n0:248_2: vaṇṇe pana kathite kato bhagavatā pañcasikhassa okāsoti devatāhi saddhiṃ upasaṅkamitvā pañhaṃ pucchitvā
anya-e0907n0:248_3: vissajjanāvasāne asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhahissatīti ñatvā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
anya-e0907n0:249_0: Atha kho bhagavā sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ etadavoca “acchariyamidaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa,
anya-e0907n0:249_1: abbhutamidaṃ āyasmato kosiyassa tāva bahukiccassa bahukaraṇīyassa yadidaṃ idhāgamana”nti.
anya-e0907n0:250_1: api ca devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ kehici kehici kiccakaraṇīyehi byāvaṭo,
anya-e0907n0:251_1: mama santakā”ti nicchetuṃ asakkontā aḍḍaṃ karonti,
anya-e0907n0:252_0: Yassa vimānaṃ olokentī ṭhitā, tassa santakāti vadati.
anya-e0907n0:253_0: Idheva bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ gopikā nāma sakyadhītā ahosi buddhe pasannā dhamme pasannā saṅghe pasannā sīlesu paripūrakārinī,
anya-e0907n0:253_1: sā itthittaṃ virājetvā purisattaṃ bhāvetvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapannā.
anya-e0907n0:256_0: Puccha vāsava maṃ pañhaṃ, yaṃ kiñci manasicchasi;
anya-e0907n0:257_0: Tassa tasseva pañhassa, ahaṃ antaṃ karomi te.
anya-e0907n0:258_0: Kiṃ saṃyojanā nu kho mārisa devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā ye caññe santi puthukāyā,
anya-e0907n0:258_1: te averā adaṇḍā asapattā abyāpajjā viharemu averinoti iti ca nesaṃ hoti.
anya-e0907n0:258_2: Atha ca pana saverā sadaṇḍā sasapattā sabyāpajjā viharanti saverinoti.
anya-e0907n0:259_0: Issāmacchariyasaṃyojanā kho devānaminda devā manussā asurā nāgā gandhabbā yecaññe santi puthukāyā,
anya-e0907n0:259_1: te averā adaṇḍā asapattā abyāpajjā viharemu averinoti iti ca nesaṃhoti,
anya-e0907n0:259_2: atha ca pana saverā sadaṇḍā sasapattā sabyāpajjā viharanti saverinoti.
anya-e0907n0:261_1: taṃladdhānaṃ vā labhitabbānaṃ vā attano sampattīnaṃ nigūhanalakkhaṇaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:262_0: Kiṃ vaṇṇo esoti taṃ taṃ dosaṃ vadanto pariyattiñca kassaci kiñci adento dubbaṇṇo ceva eḷamūgoca hoti.
anya-e0907n0:263_0: Yāva taṃ nappahīyati, tāva devamanussā averatādīni patthayantāpi verādīni naparimuccantiyeva.
anya-e0907n0:264_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo bhagavantaṃ uttari pañhaṃ apucchi–
anya-e0907n0:265_0: Issāmacchariyaṃ pana mārisa kiṃ nidānaṃ kiṃ samudayaṃ kiṃ jātikaṃ kiṃ pabhavaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:266_0: Issāmacchariyaṃ kho devānaminda piyāppiyanidānaṃ piyāppiyasamudayaṃ piyāppiyajātikaṃ piyāppiyapabhavaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:267_0: Na sakkā dātuṃ, kilamissati vā ukkaṇṭhissati vātiādīni vatvā macchariyaṃ karoti.
anya-e0907n0:268_0: Aho vatassa evarūpaṃ na bhaveyyāti issaṃ karoti.
anya-e0907n0:269_0: Mayampetaṃ mamāyantā na paribhuñjāma, na sakkā dātunti macchariya karoti.
anya-e0907n0:270_0: Ṭhapetvā maṃ ko añño evarūpassa lābhīti issaṃ vā karoti,
anya-e0907n0:270_1: yācito tāvakālikampi adadamāno macchariyaṃ vā karoti.
anya-e0907n0:271_0: Piyāppiyaṃ kho pana mārisa kiṃnidānaṃ kiṃsamudayaṃ kiṃjātikaṃ kiṃpabhavaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:272_0: Piyāppiyaṃ kho devānaminda chandanidānaṃ chandasamudayaṃ chandajātikaṃ chandapabhavaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:274_0: Ime maṃ rakkhissanti gopissanti mamāyissanti samparivārayissantīti.
anya-e0907n0:275_0: Chando kho pana mārisa kiṃnidāno kiṃsamudayo kiṃjātiko kiṃpabhavo,
anya-e0907n0:275_3: Chando kho devānaminda vitakkanidāno vitakkasamudayo vitakkajātiko vitakkapabhavo,
anya-e0907n0:276_8: ettakaṃ parassa dassāmīti vavatthānaṃ vitakkavinicchayena hoti.
anya-e0907n0:277_0: Kathaṃ paṭipanno pana mārisa bhikkhu papañcasaññāsaṅkhānirodhasāruppagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ paṭipanno hotīti.
anya-e0907n0:278_0: Somanassaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpi.
anya-e0907n0:278_1: Domanassaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpi.
anya-e0907n0:278_2: Upekkhaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpi.
anya-e0907n0:279_0: Kiṃ pana bhagavatā pucchitaṃ kathitaṃ apucchitaṃ, sānusandhikaṃ ananusandhikanti.
anya-e0907n0:280_0: Pucchitameva kathitaṃ no apucchitaṃ. Sānusandhikameva no ananusandhikaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:281_0: Ime pañcakkhandhā kiṃ hetukāti upaparikkhandho avijjādihetukāti passati.
anya-e0907n0:284_0: “Somanassaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpī”ti itikho panetaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:284_2: Tattha yaṃ jaññā somanassaṃ “imaṃ kho me somanassaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti,
anya-e0907n0:284_5: Tattha yaṃ jaññā somanassaṃ “imaṃ kho me somanassaṃ sevato akusalā dhammā parihāyanti,
anya-e0907n0:284_12: “Somanassaṃpāhaṃ devānaminda duvidhena vadāmi sevitabbaṃpi asevitabbaṃpī”ti iti yaṃ taṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:285_0: Na laddhaṃ vata me sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretunti āvajjato domanassaṃ uppajjati,
anya-e0907n0:285_1: assudhārā pavattanti gāmanta pabbhāravāsī mahāsīvattherassa viya.
anya-e0907n0:286_2: ovādamassa dassāmīti ākāsena gantvā vihārasamīpe otaritvā divāṭṭhāne nisinnaṃ ācariyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā vattaṃ dassetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
anya-e0907n0:288_0: Na te tumhākaṃ anumodanāya atthoti ākāse uppatitvā agamāsi.
anya-e0907n0:289_1: mayhaṃ pana aṅkusako bhavissāmīti āgatoti ñatvā idāni okāso na bhavissati,
anya-e0907n0:289_2: paccūsakāle gamissāmīti pattacīvaraṃ samīpe katvā sabbaṃ divasabhāgaṃ paṭhamayāma majjhimayāmañca dhammaṃ
anya-e0907n0:289_3: vācetvā pacchimayāme ekasmiṃ there uddesaṃ gahetvā nikkhante pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā teneva saddhiṃ nikkhanto.
anya-e0907n0:290_0: Tato “na mañce mayhaṃ catūhi iriyāpathehi maggaphalaṃ uppajjissati arahattaṃ apatvā neva mañce piṭṭhiṃ pasāressāmi,
anya-e0907n0:290_1: na pāde dhovissāmīti mañcaṃ ussāpetvā ṭhapesi.
anya-e0907n0:291_2: addhā me imasmiṃ attabhāve maggovā phalaṃvā natthi,
anya-e0907n0:291_3: na me laddhaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ visuddhipavāraṇaṃ pavāretunti cintesi.
anya-e0907n0:292_0: Bho mahāsīvatthera devatāpi tayā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karonti,
anya-e0907n0:292_1: anucchavikaṃ nu kho te etanti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ aggahesi.
anya-e0907n0:292_2: So idāni nipajjissāmīti senāsanaṃ paṭijaggitvā mañcakaṃ paññapetvā udakaṭṭhāne udakaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā pāde dhovissāmīti sopānaphalake nisīdi.
anya-e0907n0:293_0: Apetha bhante mātugāmoti okāsaṃ kāretvā theraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā purato ukkuṭiko nisīditvā pāde dhovissāmīti āha.
anya-e0907n0:298_10: Ahampitena ādiyo bhaveyyaṃ āmisadāyādā satthu sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0907n0:298_12: Tumhe ca me bhikkhave dhammadāyādā bhaveyyātha no āmisadāyādā.
anya-e0907n0:298_13: Tumhepi tena ādiyā bhaveyyātha dhammadāyādā satthu sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0907n0:299_0: Kahaṃ buddho kahaṃ bhagavā kahaṃ devadevo narāsabho purisasīhoti bhagavantaṃ pariyesanti.
anya-e0907n0:300_0: Vuttampicetaṃ “tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvara
anya-e0907n0:301_0: Yāvatā kho cunda etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno,
anya-e0907n0:302_2: Sā ca nesaṃ pavatti bhagavatopi pākaṭā ahosi.
anya-e0907n0:302_3: Tato bhagavā ananucchavikanti dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā cintesi.
anya-e0907n0:303_0: Paccayā akappiyāti na sakkā sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:304_0: Sā sikkhākāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sikkhāpadapaññatti viya bhavissati nagaradvāre ṭhapitasabbakāyikaādāso viya ca,
anya-e0907n0:304_1: yathā hi nagara dvāre ṭhapite sabbakāyike ādāse cattāro vaṇṇā attano chāyaṃ disvā vajjaṃ pahāya niddosā honti.
anya-e0907n0:305_0: So hi brāhmaṇa bhagavā anuppannassa maggassa uppādetā,
anya-e0907n0:305_5: passaṃ passati cakkhubhūto ñāṇabhūto dhammabhūto brahmabhūto vattā pavattā atthassa ninnetā amatassa dātā dhammassāmī tathāgatotica, ….
anya-e0907n0:306_0: Paṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena sahatthā santappesi sampavāresi.
anya-e0907n0:307_0: Are tvaṃ sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā īdisaṃ icchaṃ uppādesi.
anya-e0907n0:309_0: Amhākaṃ bhadanto subharo thokenapi tussati, mayameva naṃ posissāmāti paṭiññaṃ katvā posenti.
anya-e0907n0:310_0: “Are tvaṃ nāma tadā sugatātirittampi piṇḍapātaṃ paṭikkhipitvā tathā jighacchādubbalyaparetopi samaṇadhammaṃ katvā ajja kosajjamanuyuñjasi” –
anya-e0907n0:311_0: Yā ca kho ānandakathā abhisallekhitā cetovinīvaraṇasappāyā ekantanibbidāya virāgāya nirodhāya upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattati.
anya-e0907n0:312_0: Idamavoca bhagavā, idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṃ pāvisi.
anya-e0907n0:313_0: Imaṃ mayā saṃkhittena uddesaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ vitthārena avibhattaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:313_1: dhammapaṭiggāhakā bhikkhū uggahetvā ānandaṃ vā kaccānaṃ vā upasaṅkamitvā pucchissanti,
anya-e0907n0:315_0: Evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā nātike viharati giñjakāvasathe,
anya-e0907n0:315_1: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ca anuruddho āyasmā ca nandiyo āyasmā ca kimilo gosiṅgasālavanadāye viharanti.
anya-e0907n0:315_2: Athakho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yena gosiṅgasālavanadāyo,
anya-e0907n0:315_4: Addasā kho dāyapālo bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:315_5: Disvāna bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “mā mahāsamaṇa etaṃ dāyaṃ pāvisi,
anya-e0907n0:316_0: Ahaṃ ime kulaputte paggaṇhitvā ukkaṃsitvā paṭisanthāraṃ katvā dhammaṃ nesaṃ desessāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:317_0: Assosi kho āyasmā anuruddho dāyapālassa bhagavatā saddhiṃ mantayamānassa.
anya-e0907n0:318_2: ayañca dāyapālo pabbajitena viya saddhiṃ katheti,
anya-e0907n0:319_0: Ayaṃ dāyapālo phaṇakataṃ āsivisaṃ gīvāya gahetuṃ hatthaṃ pasārentoviya loke aggapuggalena saddhiṃ kathentova na jānāti,
anya-e0907n0:320_2: Samaggavāso nāma na bhavissatīti piyamitte gahetvāva paccuggamanaṃ karissāmi.
anya-e0907n0:320_5: tehi saddhiṃ paccuggamanaṃ kātukāmo sayaṃ akatvāva upasaṅkami.
anya-e0907n0:321_1: yaṃ nūnāhaṃ sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā imesaṃyeva āyasmantānaṃ cittassa vasena vatteyyanti.
anya-e0907n0:321_2: So kho ahaṃ bhante sakaṃ cittaṃ nikkhipitvā imesaṃyeva āyasmantānaṃ cittassa vasena vattāmi,
anya-e0907n0:321_3: nānāhi kho no bhante kāyā ekañca pana maññe cittanti.
anya-e0907n0:322_0: Sādhu sādhu anuruddhā, kacci pana vo anuruddhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathāti.
anya-e0907n0:323_0: Taggha mayaṃ bhante appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharāmāti.
anya-e0907n0:324_0: Yathā kathaṃ pana tumhe anuruddhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharathāti.
anya-e0907n0:325_0: Atthi pana vo anuruddhā evaṃ appamattānaṃ ātāpīnaṃ pahitattānaṃ viharantānaṃ uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāroti.
anya-e0907n0:326_2: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāma,
anya-e0907n0:326_3: ayaṃ kho no bhante amhākaṃ appamattānaṃ ātāpīnaṃ pahitattānaṃ viharantānaṃ uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato phāsuvihāroti.
anya-e0907n0:330_0: Evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā āḷaviyaṃ viharati āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane.
anya-e0907n0:331_0: Nāsakkhi migaṃ gahetunti apavādamocanatthaṃ kājenādāya āgacchanto nagarassāvidūre bahalapattapalāsaṃ
anya-e0907n0:332_0: Ye ye vajjā honti, te te sandhāya “yo jīvitatthiko, so nikkhamatū”ti bhaṇati.
anya-e0907n0:333_0: Rājā core gahetvā yakkhassa detīti manussā corakamma to paṭiviratā.
anya-e0907n0:333_1: Tato aparena samayena navacorānaṃ abhāvena purāṇacorānañca parikkhayena bandhanāgārāni suññāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:334_0: Rājā amhākaṃ pitaraṃ amhākaṃ pitāmahaṃ pesetīti manussā khobhaṃ karissanti,
anya-e0907n0:335_0: Natthi deva nagare dārako ṭhapetvā antepure tava puttaṃ āḷavakakumāranti.
anya-e0907n0:336_0: Atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami,
anya-e0907n0:336_5: Dutiyampi kho oḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca nikkhama samaṇāti.
anya-e0907n0:336_9: Tatiyampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca nikkhama samaṇāti.
anya-e0907n0:336_13: Catutthampi kho āḷavako yakkho bhagavantaṃ etadavoca nikkhama samaṇāti.
anya-e0907n0:336_22: Na khvāhaṃ taṃ āvuso passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya,
anya-e0907n0:336_23: yo me cittaṃ vā khipeyya hadayaṃ vā phāleyya pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyya.
anya-e0907n0:336_24: Apica tvaṃ āvuso puccha yadā kaṅkhasīti.
anya-e0907n0:337_0: Ko so bhagavānāma, yo mama bhavanaṃ paviṭṭhoti āha.
anya-e0907n0:338_0: Na tvaṃ āvuso jānāsi bhagavantaṃ amhākaṃ satthāraṃ,
anya-e0907n0:338_1: yo tusitabhavane ṭhito pañcamahāvilokitaṃ viloketvātiādinā nayena yāva dammacakkapavattanā kathentā paṭisandhiādīsu
anya-e0907n0:338_2: dvattiṃsapubbanimittāni vatvā imānipi tvaṃ āvuso acchariyāni nāddasāti codesuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:339_0: Passatha dāni tumhākaṃ vā satthā mahānubhāvo,
anya-e0907n0:339_1: ahaṃ vāti dakkhiṇapādena saṭṭhiyojanamattaṃ kelāsapabbatakūṭaṃ akkami.
anya-e0907n0:340_0: Yaṃ nūnāhaṃ kenaci ajeyyaṃ dussāvudhaṃ muñceyyanti.
anya-e0907n0:341_1: handa naṃ rosetvā mettāya viyojemīti iminā sambandhenetaṃ vuttaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:341_2: atha kho āḷavako yakkho yena bhagavā…pe…
anya-e0907n0:342_1: evaṃ nāma nikkhametuṃ sukhaṃ samaṇaṃ akāraṇenevāhaṃ sakalarattiṃ yuddhena abbhuyyāsinti muducitto hutvā puna cintesi –
anya-e0907n0:343_0: Subbaco ayaṃ samaṇo nikkhamāti vutto nikkhamati.
anya-e0907n0:343_2: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ imaṃ samaṇaṃ evameva sakalarattiṃ kilametvā pāde gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipeyyanti pāpakaṃ cittaṃ
anya-e0907n0:364_0: Kathaṃsu tarati oghaṃ, kathaṃsu tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:368_0: Kathaṃsu labhate paññaṃ, kathaṃsu vindate dhanaṃ;
anya-e0907n0:369_0: Kathaṃsu kittiṃ pappoti, kathaṃ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0907n0:370_0: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socatīti–
anya-e0907n0:374_0: Saccena kittiṃ pappoti, dadaṃ mittāni ganthati.
anya-e0907n0:375_0: Asmā loko paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socati.
anya-e0907n0:384_0: Kathaṃ nu dāni puccheyyaṃ, puthū samaṇabrāhmaṇe;
anya-e0907n0:385_0: Yohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yo attho samparāyiko.
anya-e0907n0:387_0: Yohaṃ ajja pajānāmi, yattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:388_0: So ahaṃ vicarissāmi, gāmā gāmaṃ purā puraṃ;
anya-e0907n0:397_0: Ayaṃ kumāro saraṇamupeti buddhaṃ…pe… dhammaṃ…pe… saṅghaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:399_0: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
anya-e0907n0:399_1: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā sāriputto magadhesu viharati nālakagāmake ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
anya-e0907n0:399_2: Cundo ca samaṇuddeso āyasmato sāriputtassa upaṭṭhāko hoti.
anya-e0907n0:400_0: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto teneva ābādhena parinibbāyi.
anya-e0907n0:400_1: Atha kho cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmato sāriputtassa pattacīvaramādāya yena sāvatthi jetavanaṃ anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāmo,
anya-e0907n0:400_3: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
anya-e0907n0:400_4: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “āyasmā bhante sāriputto parinibbuto,
anya-e0907n0:400_6: Atthi kho idaṃ āvuso cunda kathā pābhataṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya,
anya-e0907n0:400_10: “Evaṃ bhante”ti kho cundo samaṇuddeso āyasmato ānandassa paccassosi.
anya-e0907n0:401_0: Buddhā nu kho paṭhamaṃ parinibbāyanti, udāhu aggasāvakāti.
anya-e0907n0:402_0: Anujānātu me bhante bhagavā, anujānātu sugato. Parinibbāna kālo me, ossaṭṭho me āyusaṅkhāroti.
anya-e0907n0:404_0: Atthi bhante magadhesu nālakagāme jātovarako, tatthāhaṃ parinibbāyissāmīti.
anya-e0907n0:405_0: Yassa dāni tvaṃ sāriputta kālaṃ maññasi,
anya-e0907n0:405_1: idāni pana te jeṭṭhakaniṭṭha bhātikānaṃ tādisassa bhikkhuno dassanaṃ dullabhaṃ bhavissati,
anya-e0907n0:406_0: Athakho āyasmā ca ānando cundo ca samaṇuddeso yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu,
anya-e0907n0:406_2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso ‘evamāha āyasmā bhante sāriputto parinibbuto,
anya-e0907n0:406_4: Apica me bhante ‘madhuraka jāto viya kāyo,
anya-e0907n0:406_6: dhammāpi maṃ nappaṭibhanti āyasmā sāriputto parinibbuto’ti” sutvā–
anya-e0907n0:425_0: Apica me bhante madhurakajāto viya kāyo.
anya-e0907n0:426_0: Kiṃ nukho te ānanda sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto,
anya-e0907n0:427_0: Nanu taṃ ānanda mayā paṭikacceva akkhātaṃ sabbehi piyehi manā pehi nānābhāvo vinābhāvo aññathābhāvo,
anya-e0907n0:427_1: taṃ kutettha ānanda labbhā “yaṃ taṃ jātaṃ bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ palokadhammaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:427_2: taṃ vata māpalujjī”ti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
anya-e0907n0:429_0: Tattha katamaṃ tathāgatassa ṭhānañca ṭhānato aṭṭhānañca aṭṭhānato yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:429_1: Idha tathāgato “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī”ti pajānāti,
anya-e0907n0:429_2: “ṭhānañca kho etaṃ vijjati yaṃ puthujjano kañci saṅkhāraṃ niccato upagaccheyya ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”ti –
anya-e0907n0:434_0: Mayā bhante uppanno coro na sakkā paṭibāhituṃ,
anya-e0907n0:436_0: Nāhaṃ bhante tumhesu agacchantesu gamissāmīti yāvatatiyaṃ kathetvāpi theraṃ āropetuṃ asakkontā nivattiṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:437_0: Evarūpassa nāma lābhaggayasaggappattassa sarīradhātunicayaṭṭhānaṃ anāthaṃ jātanti cintayamāno nisīdi.
anya-e0907n0:438_2: ahaṃ purato gamissāmīti theraṃ vanditvā attano bhavanaṃ agamāsi.
anya-e0907n0:438_3: Thero sabbampi bhayakālaṃ paṇṇakhādakamanusse nissāya vasi.
anya-e0907n0:439_0: Āvuso mahāsoṇa bhikkhāhāro paññāyatīti vatvā pattacīvaraṃ āropetvā cīvaraṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ nīharitvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0907n0:440_1: ekeko navahatthasāṭakena saddhiṃ ekekakahāpaṇagghanakaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ detūti manusse avocuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:441_1: buddhānaṃ upaṭṭhānaṃ karissāmīti cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ gantvā appaharitaṃ karoti.
anya-e0907n0:442_0: Mayaṃ tāva mahallakā, idaṃ nāma bhavissatīti na sakkā jānituṃ, tuvaṃ attānaṃ rakkheyyāsīti.
anya-e0907n0:443_0: Kahaṃ vattabbakanigrodhatthero, kahaṃ vattabbakanigrodhattheroti pucchitvā tassa santikaṃ agamaṃsu.
anya-e0907n0:446_0: Dhammasakaṭassa akkho bhijjati akkho bhijjatīti paridevamāno vicari.
anya-e0907n0:449_2: Idhāvuso bhikkhu anuppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā uppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti,
anya-e0907n0:449_3: uppannā me pāpakā akusalā dhammā appahīyamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti,
anya-e0907n0:449_4: anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti,
anya-e0907n0:449_5: anuppannā me kusalā dhammā anuppajjamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karoti,
anya-e0907n0:449_6: uppannā me kusalā dhammā nirujjhamānā anatthāya saṃvatteyyunti ātappaṃ karotīti.
anya-e0907n0:450_0: Upajjhāyo me ativiya pasannacitto vandati, kiṃ nu kho pupphāni labhitvā pūjaṃ kareyyāsīti cintesi.
anya-e0907n0:456_0: Aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ,
anya-e0907n0:457_2: pacchimadassanaṃ dāni idaṃ amhākanti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti.
anya-e0907n0:458_0: Ekapuggalo bhikkhave loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso,
anya-e0907n0:458_1: katamo ekapuggalo tathāgato bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti.
anya-e0907n0:464_0: Kinnū me ettha gatena attho atthi natthīti atthānatthaṃ pariggahetvā atthapariggaṇhanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ.
anya-e0907n0:465_0: Āmisatopi vaḍḍhi atthoyeva, taṃ nissāya brahmacariyā nuggahāya paṭipannattāti vadanti.
anya-e0907n0:466_0: Mayā pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhunā saddhiṃ dvekathā nāma nakathitapubbā,
anya-e0907n0:466_1: aññasmiṃ divase uparivisesaṃ nibbattessāmīti cintetvā “kiṃ bhante”ti paṭivacanaṃ adāsi.
anya-e0907n0:467_0: Bhante ete manussā tumhākaṃ kiṃhonti, mātipakkhato sambandhā pitipakkhatoti.
anya-e0907n0:468_3: etesaṃ ānubhāvena neva bhaye bhayaṃ na chātake chātakaṃ jānāma,
anya-e0907n0:468_4: edisānāma amhākaṃ upakārino natthīti tesaṃ guṇe kathento gacchati.
anya-e0907n0:469_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ nāma atthītipi saññaṃ akatvā gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisitvā ananulomikena gihisaṃsaggena saṃsaṭṭho caritvā ca bhuñjitvā ca tuccho nikkhamati.
anya-e0907n0:470_0: Āvuso tumhe na iṇaṭṭā na bhayaṭṭā na ājīvikā pakatā pabbajitā,
anya-e0907n0:470_2: Tasmā gamane uppannakilesaṃ gamaneyeva nigaṇhatha. Ṭhāne,
anya-e0907n0:471_0: Ayaṃ bhikkhu tuyhaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ jānāti,
anya-e0907n0:471_1: ananucchavikaṃ te etanti attānaṃ paṭicodetvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṃ okkamati.
anya-e0907n0:472_0: Ayaṃ thero punappunaṃ nivattitvā gacchati, kiṃ nukho maggamūḷho udāhu kiñci pamuṭṭhoti samullapanti.
anya-e0907n0:473_0: Kinnū kho ete amheheva saddhiṃ na sallapanti udāhu añña maññampi,
anya-e0907n0:474_0: Aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhati;
anya-e0907n0:477_0: Sace bhikkhave nandassa puratthimā disā āloketabbā hoti,
anya-e0907n0:477_1: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando puratthimaṃ disaṃ āloketi ‘evaṃ me puratthimaṃ disaṃ ālokayato nābhijjhā
anya-e0907n0:477_8: sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā nando anudisaṃ anuviloketi ‘evaṃ me anudisaṃ anuvilokayato…pe…
anya-e0907n0:482_0: Kasmā bhante sahasā hatthaṃ samiñjitvā puna yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā saṇikaṃ samiñjitthāti.
anya-e0907n0:483_0: Yato paṭṭhāya mayā āvuso kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikātuṃ āraddho,
anya-e0907n0:483_1: na me kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñjitvā hattho samiñjitapubbo,
anya-e0907n0:483_2: idāni pana me tumhehi saddhiṃ kathayamānena kammaṭṭhānaṃ muñcitvā samiñjito,
anya-e0907n0:483_3: tasmā puna yathā ṭhāne ṭhapetvā samiñjesinti.
anya-e0907n0:484_0: Sādhu bhante bhikkhunā nāma evarūpena bhavitabbanti.
anya-e0907n0:488_1: idhekacco puggalo kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭha vimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
anya-e0907n0:488_2: paññāya cassa disvā ekacce āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
anya-e0907n0:490_1: idhekacco puggalo naheva kho kālena kālaṃ samayena samayaṃ aṭṭhavimokkhe kāyena phusitvā viharati,
anya-e0907n0:490_2: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā honti.
anya-e0907n0:490_4: Sabbepi ariya puggalā ariye vimokkhe asamayavimuttā.
anya-e0907n0:492_1: idhekacco puggalo lābhī hoti rūpasahagatānaṃ vā arūpasahagatānaṃ vā samāpattīnaṃ,
anya-e0907n0:492_2: so ca kho na nikāmalābhī hoti na akicchalābhī na akasira lābhī,
anya-e0907n0:492_3: na yatthicchakaṃ yadicchakaṃ yāvaticchakaṃ samāpajjatipi vuṭṭhātipi,
anya-e0907n0:492_5: yaṃ tassa puggalassa pamādamāgamma tā samāpattiyo kuppeyyuṃ.
anya-e0907n0:494_1: idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipāta dhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
anya-e0907n0:494_2: so sattakkhattuṃ deve ca mānuse ca sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
anya-e0907n0:496_2: Ayameva hi bhante ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo soto.
anya-e0907n0:496_8: Yo hi bhante iminā ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena samannāgato,
anya-e0907n0:496_10: svāyaṃ āyasmā evaṃnāmo evaṃgotto iti vāti, itivā….
anya-e0907n0:498_1: Idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
anya-e0907n0:498_2: so dve vā tīṇi vā kulāni sandhāvitvā saṃsaritvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
anya-e0907n0:500_1: idhekacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo,
anya-e0907n0:500_2: so ekaṃyeva mānusakaṃ bhavaṃ nibbattetvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti,
anya-e0907n0:502_1: idhe kacco puggalo tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
